pkgmetadata.longdescription: Easy Computation of Alpha Functional Diversity Indices // Computes 5 alpha-functional diversity indices: Functional Divergence (FDiv), Function Evenness (FEve), Functional Richness (FRic), Functional Dispersion (FDis) and Rao's entropy (Q) (reviewed in Villger et al. 2008 doi:10.1890/07-1206.1). Provides efficient and modular functions to compute functional diversity indices.
